title: **1BR close to everything with a balcony and a pool 21**
posting_body: Encino 1bdr/1bath on second floor (one flight of stairs).
Unit #21.
A little under 700 sq ft. $1745.00/ mo.
on one-year lease with $1,300/security deposit.
Includes water, trash, and one parking space.
Building is only 21 units, bright and airy.
You share a stairwell with only your neighbor.
No long, dark, enclosed hallways here!
LOTS OF STORAGE.
HUGE closet in bedroom, lots of cabinets around sink, living room closet too.
A large balcony with glass sliding doors (in living room overlooking inner courtyard.)
BRIGHT AND AIRY: large windows and glass patio doors
FRESHLY PAINTED throughout.
NEW FLOORING throughout
LAUNDRY AND POOL: Coin-operated laundry on premises: 2 washers and 2 dryers.
New copper plumbing throughout building.
Enclosed pool.
*** CENTRAL HEATING AND AIR CONDITIONING***, with electronic thermostat.
One parking space.
SECURITY:
Building has security controlled access door, and closed circuit security cameras.
VERY WALKABLE:
One block north Ventura Blvd., one block west White Oak.
One block to services including major supermarket, cleaners, drugstore, restaurants, DVD rental/redbox and convenience store.
Scoring from <URL>
Walk Score 79: Very Walkable:
Most errands can be accomplished on foot.
Transit Score 45: Some Transit: A few nearby public transportation options.
Bike Score 60: Flat as a pancake, minimal bike lanes.
Call or text Alex before 10am:
show contact info
for showing or questions.
Credit check mandatory.
Applicant pays 100% of $28.50 credit check
